title: Thoughts on the new darius
body: Ok so I've seen a few posts recently and looked over and read them and it's all basically the same problem. After darius's rework people have been complaining a lot about the Q cast time because it essentially ruins darius's combo. I myself am a darius main and after playing a few games with his new rework I can understand why adding the cast time was necessary but what I feel is that it's wind up time is too long. I've looked into it and noticed quite a few other top lane champions can simply dash/escape out of his Q range the moment the indicator appears {{champion:266}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:157}} . This is why I believe the cast time shouldn't be removed but simply reduced a bit, just enough so he can't instacast it but also not give enemies time to quickly dash out of it's range (I'm sure a few of you are mad about the flash+Q combo now).

replies.body: I used to be a Darius main quite a while ago (last season) but although he was strong he lacked any escapes and the only defense you could get was by building HP (AR/MR) and although he was still strong I just felt like he lacked something.. so I was excited for this new update but like you said with his main trading tool (Q) (in lane) getting a cast time he has become pretty nasty to play. I think it would be interesting if his Q had no cast time when he was outside of his rage mode but when he gets his 5 hemorrhage stacks he gains a cast time on his Q, that way you could still play a lane phase without getting punished to hell for slipping up, but in a team fight he starts getting rolling and does more dmg but cant cast his Q as fast... this isn't making to much sense even to me but I agree with you that his Q cast time is way to long but he would be ridiculously OP if it wasn't. That being said I am pretty sure the new Skarner is way to strong (I play him a lot) especially if you try and fight him over his little shines :)
He's absolute garbage. Until someone can show me how exactly I'm meant to play this champion effectively, he is beyond shit in my mind. Sick rework.

Play him AD he's so sick.

Try like Rush Brut, then Hydra, Grab a Trinity then upgrade to youmuu's then build tank items like Randuins.

I've seen him tank, it's a bit boring and he doesn't do much but if you grab AD and consider items like Black Cleaver with Hydra he is insane.
